casebody.data:
HALO ELECTRONICS, INC., petitioner,
v.
PULSE ELECTRONICS, Inc., et al. No. 14-1513. Supreme Court of the United States Oct. 19, 2015. Motion of Independent Inventor Groups for leave to file a brief as amici curiae granted. Motion of Nokia Technologies OY, et al. for leave to file a brief as amici curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Federal Circuit granted in No. 14-1513 limited to Question 1 presented by the petition. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Federal Circuit in No. 14-1520 granted. The case is consolidated and a total of one hour is allotted for oral argument.

No opinion found. Click here to view source material.
